actions.description: The champion makes two Lightning Mace attacks or three Handaxe attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) lightning damage.
actions.name: Lightning Mace

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Handaxe

specialTraits.description: The champion has advantage on saving throws against the frightened condition.
specialTraits.name: Brave
